section.heading: Application.
section.text: Applicants for transporter registration shall make application to the Administration on forms prescribed by the Administration.

para.text: The fixed location shall meet all local zoning regulations.
A current trader's license shall be issued if required by the political subdivision for the location shown on the application for transporter registration.

annotations.annotation: Transportation Article, §12-104(b), Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulations .02 and .03 amended effective September 17, 1975 (2:21 Md. R. 1340)
Chapter revised effective June 15, 1979 (6:12 Md. R. 1051)
Regulation .02 amended effective January 29, 1996 (23:2 Md. R. 96)
Regulation .03 repealed effective January 29, 1996 (23:2 Md. R. 96)
